response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and holds great value. Given its quality and uniqueness, we believe it's worth more than what others might pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $95 for you to acquire this item. This price reflects its high value while also allowing us to cover our costs and ensure sustainability. We hope you'll find this offer attractive and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 95}
